item.title: RESTfly API Library
item.description: With all of the work thats been done with the pyTenable library, I reached a point where I was using pyTenable’s core APISession, APIEndpoint, and APIIterator classes a lot for external work. It seemed only logical to separate these base classes from pyTenable and wrap them up into their own library to act as a framework for folks looking to build their own API libraries. The end result of this is the new Python RESTfly library, which is focused on providing a basic scaffolding to make writing API libraries similar to pyTenable’s easy and and effective.
